title: Nyubba Cargo Barge Driver
wikitext:
'''Nyubba Cargo Barge Driver'''

Damage: 4D '''Note''': Add +1 Difficulty of any space transports roll for each of the first eight barges. For each additional barge past eight, add +1D to difficulties.
